trigger_description: This trigger fires when you add an attachment (like a receipt, or photo) to a transaction.

trigger: Any new blog post from Monzo
trigger_description: This trigger fires whenever Monzo publishes a new blog post.
This trigger fires whenever you spend money with your Monzo card, and the transaction goes through.

trigger: Any card purchase below an amount
trigger_description: This trigger fires whenever you spend less than the specified amount with your Monzo card, and the transaction goes through.

trigger: Any card purchase at a merchant
trigger_description: This trigger fires whenever you spend money at a particular merchant, and the transaction goes through.

trigger: Any card purchase above an amount
trigger_description: This trigger fires whenever you spend more than the specified amount with your Monzo card, and the transaction goes through.
